title: My Lag....
body:
Im pretty sure it's my computer or internet, but seriously, i even got bugsplatted like 4 times in one match
What to do...

replies.body: Oh and i forgot to mention its a Mac...

Admin cmd
chkdsk /f /x /r (then reboot and wait...could be a while)
sfc /scannow

Check your net at 
speedtest.net and pingtest.net

Lastly run a repair on the client.

Some bugsplats are due to some Logitech files in the league launcher.

LogitechGKey.dll and LogitechLed.dll

Location of files: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln\release s

Delete them.
